Career Profile

Senior IT researcher at INAF - Astrophysical Observatory of Catania focusing on scientific visualization, big-data analysis, science gateways, workflow management systems and data systems exploiting distributed infrastructures. Her skills include the management of projects in all phases, starting from the proposal preparation towards a successful project execution, including also the administrative and financial aspects. She has been engaged in the last 10 years in the management and technological activities of several European Commission funded projects such as: FP7 SCI-BUS, FP7 VIALACTEA, H2020 INDIGO-DataCloud, H2020 AENEAS, H2020 EOSC-Pilot, H2020 NEANIAS and she is currently project manager of HE SPACE CoE. She is actively involved within the IT activities of the PNRR National Center of HPC, Big Data and Quantum Computing, the ESA GAIA mission and the Square Kilometre Array (SKA). She is co-author of about 100 papers published in refereed journals, conference proceedings and book chapters.

INAF Astrophysical Observatory of Catania

  • High Performance Computing (HPC), High-Throughput Computing (HTC) techniques, Cloud and middleware for large data analysis.
  • User interfaces for data processing, reprocessing and analysis: application to the AENEAS project and to scientific workflows in the ASTRI/CTA Data Challenge.

UMI

Unione Matematica Italiana U.M.I. Award, UMI MIT-Italy Program. This award allowed me to spend a research period during my doctorate at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Boston, U.S.A.

Projects

Participation in international and national projects and collaborations.

ICSC - ICSC National Research Centre for High Performance Computing, Big Data and Quantum Computing.
SPACE CoE - EU Centre of Excellence focused on astrophysical and cosmological applications.
NEANIAS - Novel EOSC Services for Emerging Atmosphere, Underwater & Space Challenges
AENEAS - A science-driven, functional design for a distributed, federated European Science Data Centre (ESDC) for the Square Kilometre Array.

OSS Contributions

Contributions to open source software.

VisIVOServer - Suite of software tools for creating customized views of 3D renderings from astrophysical data
ViaLactea Visual Analytics - Exploit a combination of all new-generation surveys of the Galactic Plane to study the star formation process of the Milky Way.
